29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

125435.name: Tracks of Destiny
125435.lore: Your victory is secured by countless failures, and the small steps you have taken led you to the turning point of fate.

151161.name: Shape Shifter's Lightning Staff
151161.desc: A wooden staff with a pointed tip. It belonged to a shape shifter from the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus. Can be used for the Ascension of Lightning characters.
151161.lore:
According to ancient Xianzhou records, those who have ascended can summon lightning and command the wind. The Disciples of Sanctus Medicus claimed to have inherited the way of the gods. By demonstrating godly power, the disciples gathered large numbers of worshipers in secret. Branches of lightning coil around this wooden staff — could it be that the disciples were indeed no mere mortals?

"The mortal body is but an illusion. Truth is only revealed to those who choose to ascend."

409960.name: Traveler's Guide
409960.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>20,000</nobr> Character EXP.
409960.lore:
Required reading for world exploration. Press the "Read" button to tune in to an attractive voice in a language you understand, telling you about the legendary encounters of renowned adventurers across different worlds as well as the precious wisdom and knowledge that they have gathered.

"All-new series of the Traveler's Guide, The Chef's Manual to Galactic Cuisine, is now available for purchase."
"For submissions, please connect to synesthesia beacon ERD-23θ to contact an Intelligentsia Guild representative. Method of payment can be arranged to your convenience."

409961.name: Adventure Log
409961.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>5000</nobr> Character EXP.
409961.lore:
A neatly organized collection of educational adventure notes containing countless illustrations and texts entailing adventures from beginning to end, as well as valuable information and survival-related techniques.

"Why not just digitize it and save it on a photolith disk? That'd be much more convenient."
"Advanced technology is far more fragile than you'd think when faced with stellar storms and neuron flow eruptions. Besides, I'm sure the author of this book wanted people to read it in the simplest of ways."

409962.name: Travel Encounters
409962.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>1000</nobr> Character EXP.
409962.lore:
A travel diary with messy handwriting and random content. It's not of much use to you.

"Dan Heng, hurry up and finish reading it so you can throw it away."

470781.name: Past Evils of the Borehole Planet Disaster
470781.lore:
As a descendant bred personally by the Imperator Insectorum, its only desire is to expand the numbers of its kind. It uses giant scythes to harvest planets for its nest, tirelessly nurturing countless offspring, and devastating innumerable lives until the moment of its death.

"On the broken planet, giant locusts blotted out the sky, and swarms of insects poured out of the planet's crust. The stag beetle raised this new nest and presented it as a gift to its Imperator Insectorum... May this horror only exist in historical records, never to appear again."

549209.name: Dream Collection Component
549209.desc: A storage device for Dreamscape creations. Crude material used for enhancement.
549209.lore:
A storage device for broken dreams, providing a fundamental energy source for Dreamscape creations.

"Install this device, and you will get a member of the Sweet Dreams Troupe."
comeFrom: Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

589818.name: Starfire Essence
589818.desc: A mature heliobus that ran away after the Flaming Catastrophe War. Used to level up Traces moderately for Nihility characters.
589818.lore:
A mean and nasty heliobus that appears like a full flame.
The size of a heliobus's flame when it materializes indicates its strength. This torch-like heliobus has just tasted consciousness and is eager to devour its host's emotions and desires.

"Absorb their emotions and sway their wills..."

633150.name: Dream Flow Valve
633150.desc: A control component for Dreamscape creations. Normal material used for enhancement.
633150.lore:
A dream-building device that regulates desires and controls the Dreamscape creations' emotions.

"If this device fails, you will get a member of the Dreamjolt Troupe."
comeFrom: Dreamjolt Troupe at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

673759.name: Heaven Incinerator
673759.desc: A beast-form heliobus that homogenized after the Flaming Catastrophe War. Used to level up Traces significantly for Nihility characters.
673759.lore:
An intelligent and powerful heliobus that has started to take the form of a beast.
The size of a heliobus's flame when it materializes indicates its strength. A large heliobus, having homogenized its numerous lesser peers, will gradually have a stable shape. These immortal beings can become so dangerous that they are considered calamities.

"Floods, fires, landslides, and thunderstorms..."

717091.name: Dream Making Engine
717091.desc: An energy core for Dreamscape creations. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717091.lore:
A dream-building device that constructs fantasies and grants souls to Dreamscape creations.

"If this device malfunctions... try to wake up before you descend into a nightmare, my friend."
comeFrom: Dreamjolt Troupe at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

874345.name: Fiery Spirit
874345.desc: Feeble heliobus that scattered after the Flaming Catastrophe War. Used to level up Traces slightly for Nihility characters.
874345.lore:
An innocent, formless heliobus.
The size of a heliobus's flame when it materializes indicates its strength. This little heliobus is innocent and naive and may be easily consumed by more powerful heliobi.

"Formless, rootless, and roaming boundless..."

ranks.name: Silenced Sky Spake Sooth
ranks.descHash: When dealing DMG to debuffed enemies, increases the CRIT Rate by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.

ranks.name: Mute Thunder in Still Tempest
ranks.descHash: The number of Nihility characters required for the Trace "The Abyss" to achieve its highest possible effect is reduced by 1. When this unit's turn starts, gains 1 point of Slashed Dream and inflicts 1 stack of Crimson Knot on the enemy with the most Crimson Knot stacks.

ranks.name: Frost Bites in Death
ranks.descHash:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: Shrined Fire for Mirrored Soul
ranks.descHash: When enemy targets enter combat, inflicts them with the Ultimate DMG Vulnerability, increasing the amount of Ultimate DMG they take by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.

ranks.name: Strewn Souls on Erased Earths
ranks.descHash:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

ranks.name: Apocalypse, the Emancipator
ranks.descHash: Increases the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt by Acheron by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. The DMG dealt by Basic ATK and Skill will also be considered as Ultimate DMG and can reduce enemy toughness regardless of Weakness Types. When breaking Weaknesses, triggers the Lightning Weakness Break effect.

skills.descHash: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Acheron's ATK to a single target enemy.
skills.name: Trilateral Wiltcross

skills.descHash: Gains #3[i] point(s) of Slashed Dream. Inflicts #3[i] stack(s) of Crimson Knot on a single target enemy, dealing Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Acheron's ATK to this target, as well as Lightning DMG equal to #2[i]% of Acheron's ATK to adjacent targets.
skills.name: Octobolt Flash

skills.descHash:
Sequentially unleash Rainblade 3 times and Stygian Resurge 1 time, dealing Lightning DMG up to #6[i]% of Acheron's ATK to a single target enemy, as well as Lightning DMG up to #7[i]% of Acheron's ATK to other targets.

Rainblade: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[f1]% of Acheron's ATK to a single target enemy and removes up to 3 stacks of Crimson Knot from the target. When Crimson Knot is removed, immediately deals Lightning DMG equal to #2[f1]% of Acheron's ATK to all enemies. For every stack of Crimson Knot removed, this DMG Multiplier is additionally increased, up to a maximum of #5[f1]%.

Stygian Resurge: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #3[i]% of Acheron's ATK to all enemies and remove all Crimson Knots.

Crimson Knot cannot be applied to enemies during the Ultimate.
skills.name: Slashed Dream Cries in Red

skills.descHash:
When Slashed Dream reaches #1[i] point(s), the Ultimate can be activated. During the Ultimate, reduces enemies' Toughness regardless of Weakness Types and reduces all enemies' All-Type RES by #2[i]%, lasting until the end of the Ultimate.
When any unit inflicts debuffs on an enemy target while using their ability, Acheron gains 1 point of Slashed Dream and inflicts 1 stack of Crimson Knot on a target. If debuffs are inflicted on multiple targets, then the 1 stack of Crimson Knot will be inflicted on the enemy target with the most Crimson Knot stacks. This effect can only trigger once for every ability use.
After an enemy target exits the field or gets defeated by any unit while Acheron is on the field, their Crimson Knot stacks will be transferred to the enemy target with the most Crimson Knot stacks on the whole field.
skills.name: Atop Rainleaf Hangs Oneness

skills.descHash: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
skills.name: Attack

skills.descHash:
Immediately attacks the enemy. At the start of each wave, gains Quadrivalent Ascendance, dealing Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Acheron's ATK to all enemies and reducing Toughness of all enemies irrespective of Weakness Types. When breaking Weaknesses, triggers the Lightning Weakness Break effect.
Quadrivalent Ascendance: After using the Ultimate, Acheron gains #2[i] point(s) of Slashed Dream and inflicts #2[i] stack(s) of Crimson Knot on a single random enemy.
If attacking a normal enemy, immediately defeats them without entering combat. When not hitting enemies, no Technique Points are consumed.
skills.name: Quadrivalent Ascendance

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When battle starts, immediately gains <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> point(s) of Slashed Dream and applies <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> stack(s) of Crimson Knot to a random enemy. When Slashed Dream reaches its upper limit, for every point of Slashed Dream that exceeds the limit, gains 1 stack of Quadrivalent Ascendance. Enables Quadrivalent Ascendance to stack up to <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> time(s).
embedBonusSkill.name: Red Oni

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When there are 1 or 2 Nihility characters other than Acheron in the team, the DMG dealt by Acheron's Basic ATK, Skill, and Ultimate increases to <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> or <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> of the original DMG respectively.
embedBonusSkill.name: The Abyss

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When the Rainblade from Acheron's Ultimate hits enemy targets with Crimson Knot, her DMG increases by #1[i]%, stacking up to #2[i] time(s) and lasting for #3[i] turn(s). And when Stygian Resurge triggers, additionally deals DMG for #4[i] times. Each time deals Lightning DMG equal to #5[i]% of Acheron's ATK to a single random enemy and is viewed as part of the Ultimate DMG.
embedBonusSkill.name: Thunder Core

voiceItems.title: First Meeting
voiceItems.text: "Acheron..." Merely a borrowed name. You know my nature, remember my deeds... Thus, I am Acheron.

voiceItems.title: Greeting
voiceItems.text: It's raining... Trailblazer, care to join me for a walk? Here, I have an umbrella.

voiceItems.title: Parting
voiceItems.text: Our journey begins anew. Life passes like a fleeting rain, eventually merging with the ground. May our next encounter be... under a clear sky.

voiceItems.title: About Self: Movement
voiceItems.text: Lone voyagers in the cosmos are driven by two desires: To tread in the trails of the past, and to forge their own way. But under THEIR scrutiny... most end up adhering to the former.

voiceItems.title: About Self: Habits
voiceItems.text: In the hazy memories of my distant hometown, there were often heavy thunderstorms. Fearing their makeup would be ruined by the rain, girls carried makeup with them wherever they went. I have no reason to do so anymore, but the habit still remains.

voiceItems.title: About Self: Identity
voiceItems.text: Dreams, in essence, are meaningless. Their purpose is painted by the backdrop of life. Yet, if that backdrop is "emptiness"... then dreams are reduced to colorless, hollow shells.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "A Walk Among the Tombstones"

voiceItems.title: Chat: Rain
voiceItems.text: As the raindrops tumble from the crimson leaves, their pitter-patter on my umbrella whispers gently to me. In these moments... I find brief serenity.

voiceItems.title: Chat: Weapon
voiceItems.text: If one carries a blade, it's bound to be used to cut something down. My reason for drawing my sword — past, present, or future — remains singular.

voiceItems.title: Hobbies: Peaches
voiceItems.text: They embody life's delights and pleasures, but are equally fragile and short-lived... Such regret is inevitable, so let it be.

voiceItems.title: Annoyances
voiceItems.text: When I awoke from that place, the sea's horizon still held faint thunder, and the falling blood rain was easing — the sight of that moment lay strikingly clear before me.

voiceItems.title: Annoyances
voiceItems.text: When I awoke from that place, the sea's horizon still held faint thunder, and the falling blood rain was easing — the sight of that moment lay strikingly clear before me. All other memories, both prior and subsequent, paled and slowly ebbed away.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "A Walk Among the Tombstones"

voiceItems.title: Something to Share: Weapon
voiceItems.text: Curious about this blade? When unsheathed, every memory of having used it is unveiled... from Origin, to End... then Naught.

voiceItems.title: Knowledge: Black Holes
voiceItems.text: Black holes aren't spectacular, nor are they fierce. They're silent, like a lone, forlorn gaze watching over you and me... and then gently they consume everything, bestowing a frigid, silent embrace.

voiceItems.title: Knowledge: Paths
voiceItems.text: Seeking knowledge, craving revelation, striving to exist... humans traverse the path of fate.

voiceItems.title: Knowledge: Paths
voiceItems.text: Humans traverse the path of fate... seeking knowledge, craving revelation, striving to exist...
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "A Walk Among the Tombstones"

voiceItems.title: About Trailblazer
voiceItems.text: I, too, was once kept in someone's heart like you. Those trivial moments, when looked back upon, are worth more than a thousand words... The past shapes who we are today. Some things are hard to remember, others hard to forget.

voiceItems.title: About Firefly
voiceItems.text: In her, I see the fireflies of the forest, dazzling and bewitching, yet shining only for a brief moment.

voiceItems.title: About Black Swan
voiceItems.text: A lady of elegance and dignity, her benevolent offer lingers in my memory. That dance... it brought me a sense of warmth and nostalgia.

voiceItems.title: About Aventurine
voiceItems.text: A shattered emptiness draped in the guise of desire... his existence is strikingly powerful, yet the self beneath is extraordinarily faint.

voiceItems.title: About Welt
voiceItems.text: There are many types of people called "heroes," and he is among the most genuine... I have seen many such people come and go.

voiceItems.title: About Sam
voiceItems.text: Wherever the fiery giant treads, scorched earth follows. Yet, it's those consumed by unending fire... who, after the flames vanish, quietly hold the ashes in their lonesome embrace.

voiceItems.title: Eidolon Activation
voiceItems.text: "To cross the same river twice" ...Hardly a hardship.

voiceItems.title: Character Ascension
voiceItems.text: Never turn back — the path behind is gone.

voiceItems.title: Max Level Reached
voiceItems.text: The distant vistas are hazy... but must surely hold beauty.

voiceItems.title: Trace Activation
voiceItems.text: Another blank canvas.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Trailblazer
voiceItems.text: So it's you... Our time spent with one another is precious.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Black Swan
voiceItems.text: Our paths cross once more... Ready for another dance, Memokeeper?

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Aventurine
voiceItems.text: All or nothing... time will tell.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Welt
voiceItems.text: Even before the abyss of a black hole... we still have a choice.

voiceItems.title: About Boothill
voiceItems.text: Galaxy Ranger... His affiliation with the organization is merely a cover. It's evident that he lives only for himself, and that is exactly why I have faith in him.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Boothill
voiceItems.text: You're fast... hand at the holster already?

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Firefly
voiceItems.text: You can't escape the past, and neither can I.

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
voiceItems.text: Half the work is already done.

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
voiceItems.text: This is where it ends.

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 1
voiceItems.text: Did you come here of your own volition, or was it fate?

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 2
voiceItems.text: Another journey begins.

voiceItems.title: Turn Idling
voiceItems.text: Hasten — we've hardly any time left to say farewell.

voiceItems.title: Basic ATK
voiceItems.text: Where are you going?

voiceItems.title: Skill 1
voiceItems.text: Existence is fleeting as the dawn's dew, destined for oblivion.

voiceItems.title: Skill 2
voiceItems.text: On the still waters of oblivion, I guide the wandering souls.

voiceItems.title: Hit by Light Attack
voiceItems.text: Again?

voiceItems.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
voiceItems.text: How familiar...

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Activate
voiceItems.text: I weep for the departed...

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Unleash
voiceItems.text: Dusk's rain... it too shall fall.

voiceItems.title: Downed
voiceItems.text: All will eventually rest upon the earth...

voiceItems.title: Return to Battle
voiceItems.text: I'll stay with you a little longer.

voiceItems.title: Health Recovery
voiceItems.text: Don't worry, it's just a scrape.

voiceItems.title: Technique
voiceItems.text: Stream forth... the gleam of old blades.

voiceItems.title: Battle Won
voiceItems.text: Another blood debt repaid.

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 1
voiceItems.text: Seek, and you will find.

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 2
voiceItems.text: Don't forget to let your friends in on the action.

voiceItems.title: Precious Treasure Opening
voiceItems.text: This is what exploring the cosmos is all about.

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
voiceItems.text: Life is a puzzle in and of itself.

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
voiceItems.text: Perhaps there's more than one right answer.

voiceItems.title: Enemy Target Found
voiceItems.text: Storm's on the horizon.

voiceItems.title: Returning to Town
voiceItems.text: This haven of memories, every touch, every moment is like a thorned rose...

storyItems.title: Character Details
storyItems.text:
A drifter claiming to be a Galaxy Ranger. Her true name is unknown, and she walks the cosmos alone, carrying with her a long sword.

Though aloof and taciturn, her blade flicks out like lashing lightning. And yet, she always strikes with her scabbard, never drawing the sword free.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part I
storyItems.text:
"...Warriors don't choose their blades, but rather their blades choose them. ██████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████... On that day, as I witnessed the blade I had crafted being passed on to that girl, I realized that in the fight against ▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇, she had chosen — or been chosen — to embrace the path that ▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇ led her toward a new tomorrow. ▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇ there would be a bright future. Despite the peril looming over Izumo, its people would hold onto hope, believing that the ▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇ shall one day be vanquished, and the world shall be liberated... ▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇..."

— An Ancient Scattered Manuscript

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part II
storyItems.text:
"...Through the scrolls left behind by the blade forger, we have learned that Izumo was once on the brink of destruction. In order to survive, they forged blades from the ▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇, and those who wielded them were hailed as the saviors of their realm.

Unfortunately, the world has long vanished from the astral charts. The truth of history eludes us, and the Remembrance no longer holds its place. When the Armed Archaeologists arrived, the galaxy resounded solely with the melody of the Enigmata: ▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇ tears, rain's boundless outpour. Beneath faint curtain, survivor departs from her shore. Her homeland, ▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇..."

— Oppenheimer, the Recorder

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part III
storyItems.text:
"I used the 'Revitalization-310' tincture, which induces a profound slumber, enabling individuals to relive their past memories. While some patients found ████████████████████████████, she proved an exception. No one has ever awakened from their dream state, yet she defied the odds. I closely observed her dreams... and they can hardly be called happy moments: Gloomy skies, crumbling cities, ruined lands, and incessant rains.

The rain never stopped. Amidst the swelling tide, individuals wore smiles even as they were drowned, and within the engulfing darkness, I heard the distant rumble of thunder, until, at a particular moment, lightning shattered the veil of night. Below the fractured sky, I saw her once more: Within a world fading into oblivion, she elegantly swung her blade, eradicating the entire realm of dreams.

I must admit that she has ventured far beyond our progress on this path. The elusive ████████ beckons her toward █████████████████, yet she subtly holds its reins. Perhaps she was prepared to confront the true enemy from the very beginning of her journey..."

— A Note from a Pharmacist

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part IV
storyItems.text:
"I am leaving this letter here. In the event that I do not return, let this letter bear witness to the tale of a companion I encountered in ██████. The journey to the other side was perilous, and it was thanks to her that I managed to navigate it through...

...She had traversed numerous worlds before our paths crossed, and she possessed a wide range of life skills. Together, we cooked and established camps amidst the wilderness. On starless nights, she lent an ear to my stories and deliberated plans for the following day. Yet, more often than not, we journeyed in silence. The snow here bears a purplish-red hue, carrying the tangy flavor of raspberries. While she ███ ██████ ████ ███ █████ ██ █████, she appreciates the ██████ snow doughnuts I prepare...

...Before meeting her, I had spent countless years wading through the river of ████████. She extended her hand to me, and together, we ventured along this river. Now, the time has come for us to part ways, and I have yet to reach the shore, uncertain of what lies ahead... Even so, I see no reason to halt my journey. Life is merely a road that eventually culminates, and until that moment arrives, I shall keep pressing forward. I am certain she would do the same."

— A Note from An Adventurer

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part I
storyItems.text:
"...Warriors don't choose their blades, but rather their blades choose them. Just as people don't choose their fate, but rather their fate chooses them... On that day, as I witnessed the blade I had crafted being passed on to that girl, I realized that in the fight against Yaoyorozu no Kami, she had chosen — or been chosen — to embrace the path that seemingly led her toward a new tomorrow. How I wish that there would be a bright future, that despite the peril looming over Izumo, its people would hold onto hope, believing that the evil Kami shall one day be vanquished, and the world shall be liberated... However, it was only when the blade's light waned that I came to a realization: This is an impasse with no escape, and those who venture upon it have no recourse to turn back..."

— An Ancient Scattered Manuscript
storyItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "A Walk Among the Tombstones"

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part II
storyItems.text:
"...Through the scrolls left behind by the blade forger, we have learned that Izumo was once on the brink of destruction. In order to survive, they forged blades from the remains of Kami, and those who wielded them were hailed as the saviors of their realm. The Guild is interested in the enigmatic Yaoyorozu no Kami mentioned in these scrolls, but the Path they are associated with remains shrouded in mystery. In later accounts, the people of Izumo ceased to refer to the wielders of the blades as 'heroes,' but rather as 'revenants.'

Unfortunately, the world has long vanished from the astral charts. The truth of history eludes us, and the Remembrance no longer holds its place. When the Armed Archaeologists arrived, the galaxy resounded solely with the melody of the Enigmata: Dark Sun's tears, rain's boundless outpour. Beneath faint curtain, survivor departs from her shore. Her homeland, once saved, by her hands erased... Invisible shadows ahead, her vision encased."

— Oppenheimer, the Recorder
storyItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "A Walk Among the Tombstones"

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part III
storyItems.text:
"I used the 'Revitalization-310' tincture, which induces a profound slumber, enabling individuals to relive their past memories. While some patients found solace and rediscovered hope, she proved an exception. No one has ever awakened from their dream state, yet she defied the odds. I closely observed her dreams... and they can hardly be called happy moments: Gloomy skies, crumbling cities, ruined lands, and incessant rains.

The rain never stopped. Amidst the swelling tide, individuals wore smiles even as they were drowned, and within the engulfing darkness, I heard the distant rumble of thunder, until, at a particular moment, lightning shattered the veil of night. Below the fractured sky, I saw her once more: Within a world fading into oblivion, she elegantly swung her blade, eradicating the entire realm of dreams.

I must admit that she has ventured far beyond our progress on this path. The elusive Nihility beckons her toward self-annihilation, yet she subtly holds its reins. Perhaps she was prepared to confront the true enemy from the very beginning of her journey... Once, I asked her about the purpose behind it all, but she remained silent. Was she at a loss for words? Or did she already have an answer in mind?"

— A Note from a Doctor of Chaos
storyItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "A Walk Among the Tombstones"

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part IV
storyItems.text:
"I am leaving this letter here. In the event that I do not return, let this letter bear witness to the tale of a companion I encountered in Orkron. The journey to the other side was perilous, and it was thanks to her that I managed to navigate it through. When I first met her, it appeared that she was on a certain quest, possibly seeking revenge. However, I soon realized that it wasn't the case, as a person consumed by hatred would inevitably expose it, yet she remained remarkably composed, with only fleeting glimpses of sorrow...

...She had traversed numerous worlds before our paths crossed, and she possessed a wide range of life skills. Together, we cooked and established camps amidst the wilderness. On starless nights, she lent an ear to my stories and deliberated plans for the following day. Yet, more often than not, we journeyed in silence. The snow here bears a purplish-red hue, carrying the tangy flavor of raspberries. While she has almost lost her sense of taste, she appreciates the Orkron snow doughnuts I prepare...

...Before meeting her, I had spent countless years wading through the river of Nihility. She extended her hand to me, and together, we ventured along this river. Now, the time has come for us to part ways, and I have yet to reach the shore, uncertain of what lies ahead... Even so, I see no reason to halt my journey. Life is merely a road that eventually culminates, and until that moment arrives, I shall keep pressing forward. I am certain she would do the same."

— A Note from Frebass
storyItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "A Walk Among the Tombstones"

name: Acheron
descHash: A drifter claiming to be a Galaxy Ranger. Her true name is unknown. She walks the cosmos alone, carrying with her a long sword.
